abstract: Stocks decline as China’s slowdown continues to weigh on producers of raw materials and investors await Federal Reserve's decision on interest rates.
lead_paragraph: Without clear signals indicating whether the Federal Reserve will act on interest rates this week, traders were expected to be cautious.

headline.main: With Signs of Slowdown in China, Market Moves Lower
headline.print_headline: Trading Drifts as Wall St. Awaits Fed Move

snippet: Without clear signals indicating whether the Federal Reserve will act on interest rates this week, traders were expected to be cautious.
